name: vps-explorer
title: VPS Explorer
description: Browse, upload, download, and manage files on your VPS via Raycast!
author: Abdullah-Dev115

commands.name: browse-vps-files
commands.title: Browse VPS Files
commands.description: Browse, upload, download, and manage files on your VPS

preferences.name: vps-key-path
preferences.title: SSH Private Key Path (Optional)
preferences.description: Path to private key (e.g., ~/.ssh/id_rsa). Leave empty to use default.

preferences.name: vps-password
preferences.title: VPS Password
preferences.description: SSH password (not recommended, use SSH keys instead)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
